toys.name: Remote Control Sports Car
toys.description: A sleek and fast remote control sports car for racing enthusiasts.

toys.name: Balance Bike
toys.description: A balance bike designed to help young children learn balance and coordination before transitioning to a pedal bike.

toys.name: Construction Truck Set
toys.description: A set of construction trucks including excavators, dump trucks, and bulldozers, perfect for imaginative play.

toys.name: RC Monster Truck
toys.description: A rugged remote control monster truck that can conquer any terrain.

toys.name: Pedal Go-Kart
toys.description: A pedal-powered go-kart that provides an exciting and active outdoor experience for kids.
